data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ydwolOj4NN4Q7kNvgFAJri1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBboogLlhOE0C7sx73xq315H8OVkeqlxfYEZhYR8sxDTA&oe=6681421C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QlscW86ulwUQ7kNvgFoXc4t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB0u4RuVVFN9b2eqIFsPJKLhrS6pDvmafEIFfEKtXMpKQ&oe=66814BA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Mlip7qDSA4QQ7kNvgF9dy7J&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCj7FFtEeg-112OVI43IIxC1g4k0yCVfIGndMj66e64yQ&oe=66813307)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DfqSa4U0CHwQ7kNvgHzXk1c&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDZo5IQzZ5OwWQYq2b11ip3Hmjg-ivQnUWsSRJEFtzTzA&oe=668125E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GqtQkrWZvscQ7kNvgEoK6-P&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCK-T3mTNVMUuRFvM7vpK58uJY_jWWGOdKyBszt2YxDaw&oe=66815258)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M72hV4mVhUUQ7kNvgFBq4En&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB5cSgA033VU6xdqzpK2syqg1F3t-n8ctZCh8yGOMCUxw&oe=66814ED9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nTylAPgVXKcQ7kNvgHii1kV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9elmaKxT2Al7e-RcPxOvjBg47Gp6Sfz1cJHoSwGpdJg&oe=668134F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=h2aaTQueZx4Q7kNvgFZqfb3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBamdPj6f3bD4zf9Fz_DvXa24w5fRjsDAWoB82WPeVxvQ&oe=66811F6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=UJHH54g_MJ4Q7kNvgHLhpVo&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAuS1NmeWrmfPu1_DwEgqRBIdSnUkeWRemTMtTbX7nV3g&oe=66813317)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YS_kr6Dz_W8Q7kNvgGzKGWL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYARb2IbacLz6dhKh8jUf_U9VxA_XEsIfH3yzjIQlRvulQ&oe=66814E8C)
